messages.content: Hello my name is Priyanka Zadhar, my customer ID is 231496 and I am calling you regarding the warranty issue of the product ID 12345. I want help regarding the warranty, so help me.

**Warranty Coverage**: All products come with a 1-year manufacturer warranty from the date of purchase.

✅ **What's Covered**: Manufacturing defects and hardware failures
✅ **Extended Options**: Available at purchase for longer coverage

For warranty claims, contact our support team with your order details.
